chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R
n: nat

Goal:
StepFun a b

Premises:
Record StepFun (a b : R) : Type := mkStepFun { fe : R -> R; pre : IsStepFun fe a b } For mkStepFun: Arguments a, b, fe are implicit For StepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope] For mkStepFun: Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
phi_sequence : (nat -> posreal) -> forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> nat -> StepFun a b
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
StepFun_bound : forall f0 : StepFun ?a ?b, exists s : R, forall x : R, Rmin ?a ?b <= x <= Rmax ?a ?b -> f0 x <= s where ?a : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- R] ?b : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- R]
SF_sup_r : (R -> R) -> forall a b : R, nat -> StepFun a b
sf_SF_val_fun : (R -> R) -> forall a b : R, nat -> StepFun a b
subdivision_val : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
subdivision : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> Rlist
fct_cte = fun a _ : R => a : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
co_interval = fun a b x : R => a <= x < b : R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
open_interval = fun a b x : R => a < x < b : R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope R_scope]
StepFun_P34 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), a <= b -> Rabs (RiemannInt_SF f) <= RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => Rabs (f x); pre := StepFun_P32 f |}
StepFun_P32 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b
mult_real_fct = fun (a : R) (f : R -> R) (x : R) => a * f x : R -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
RiemannInt_P2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> a <= b -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
SF_sup_fun = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => if Rle_dec a b then SF_fun (SF_sup_seq f a b n) 0 x else SF_fun (SF_sup_seq f b a n) 0 x : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
RiemannInt_P3 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
StepFun_P36 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b) (l : Rlist), a <= b -> is_subdivision f a b l -> is_subdivision g a b l -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
IsStepFun = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => {l : Rlist & is_subdivision f a b l} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
StepFun_P28 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
StepFun_P38 : forall (l : Rlist) (a b : R) (f : R -> R), ordered_Rlist l -> pos_Rl l 0 = a -> pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = b -> {g : StepFun a b | g b = f b /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq g (co_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (f (pos_Rl l i)))}
StepFun_P6 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), IsStepFun f a b -> IsStepFun f b a
is_subdivision = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l : Rlist) => {l0 : Rlist & adapted_couple f a b l l0} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
ad_SF_sup_r : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (a <= b -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => SF_sup_fun f a b n x) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part a b n)) (seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part a b n))))) /\ (~ a <= b -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => SF_sup_fun f a b n x) a b (seq2Rlist (unif_part b a n)) (seq2Rlist (behead (pairmap (fun x y : R => Sup_fct f x y) 0 (unif_part b a n)))))
StepFun_P27 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : R -> R) (lf lg : Rlist), is_subdivision f a b lf -> is_subdivision g a b lg -> is_subdivision (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b (cons_ORlist lf lg)
SF_val_fun = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) (x : R) => SF_fun_f2 (fun x0 y : R => f ((x0 + y) / 2)) (unif_part a b n) x : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> R -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope R_scope]
StepFun_P31 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (l lf : Rlist), adapted_couple f a b l lf -> adapted_couple (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b l (app_Rlist lf Rabs)
StepFun_P25 : forall (a b : R) (f g : R -> R) (lf lg : Rlist), is_subdivision f a b lf -> is_subdivision g a b lg -> is_subdivision g a b (cons_ORlist lf lg)
StepFun_P23 : forall (a b : R) (f g : R -> R) (lf lg : Rlist), is_subdivision f a b lf -> is_subdivision g a b lg -> is_subdivision f a b (cons_ORlist lf lg)
StepFun_P8 : forall (f : R -> R) (l1 lf1 : Rlist) (a b : R), adapted_couple f a b l1 lf1 -> a = b -> Int_SF lf1 l1 = 0
SubEqui_P9 : forall (a b : R) (del : posreal) (f : R -> R) (h : a < b), {g : StepFun a b | g b = f b /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength (SubEqui del h)))%nat -> constant_D_eq g (co_interval (pos_Rl (SubEqui del h) i) (pos_Rl (SubEqui del h) (S i))) (f (pos_Rl (SubEqui del h) i)))}
continuity_pt_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (a x0 : R), continuity_pt f x0 -> continuity_pt (mult_real_fct a f) x0
StepFun_P2 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (l lf : Rlist), adapted_couple f a b l lf -> adapted_couple f b a l lf
StepFun_P21 : forall (a b : R) (f : R -> R) (l : Rlist), is_subdivision f a b l -> adapted_couple f a b l (FF l f)
